caption:
This photograph is an aerial view capturing a vast and scenic natural landscape. Key elements of this image include a serpentine river winding through the terrain, which is abundantly filled with dense green forest. The river displays a characteristic braided pattern, indicative of its shallow, rapidly eroding banks. Multiple channels of water intersect and diverge, creating islands and sandbars that appear lighter in color compared to the surrounding water.

In the background, a range of mountains stretches across the horizon, contributing to a dramatic and expansive backdrop. The mountains have gentle slopes and are also covered with vegetation, suggesting they might not be too steep or rugged. The sky above is lightly clouded, hinting at early morning or late afternoon light which casts long shadows and enhances the texture of the landscape.

There is no visible presence of human development or activity, such as buildings or infrastructure, making this area seem remote and untouched. The overall composition is rich in natural beauty and tranquillity, offering a serene glimpse into a pristine wilderness area. The photograph's vantage point provides a comprehensive look over this complex ecosystem, highlighting its natural beauty and the interplay between water and land.
title: Tonsina River in the foothills of the Chugach Range. View east. Here the pipeline will cross the river and continue south paralleling the Richardson Highway.
